mn72:3.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
mn72:3.3: Atha kho vacchagotto paribbājako yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
mn72:3.5: Sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
mn72:3.6: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho vacchagotto paribbājako bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
mn72:4.1: “Kiṃ nu kho, bho gotama, ‘sassato loko, idameva saccaṃ moghamaññan’ti—
mn72:5.1: “Kiṃ pana, bho gotama, ‘asassato loko, idameva saccaṃ moghamaññan’ti—
mn72:6.1: “Kiṃ nu kho, bho gotama, ‘antavā loko, idameva saccaṃ moghamaññan’ti—
mn72:7.1: “Kiṃ pana, bho gotama, ‘anantavā loko, idameva saccaṃ moghamaññan’ti—
mn72:8.1: “Kiṃ nu kho, bho gotama, ‘taṃ jīvaṃ taṃ sarīraṃ, idameva saccaṃ moghamaññan’ti—
mn72:8.4: ‘taṃ jīvaṃ taṃ sarīraṃ, idameva saccaṃ moghamaññan’”ti.
mn72:9.1: “Kiṃ pana, bho gotama, ‘aññaṃ jīvaṃ aññaṃ sarīraṃ, idameva saccaṃ moghamaññan’ti—
mn72:9.4: ‘aññaṃ jīvaṃ aññaṃ sarīraṃ, idameva saccaṃ moghamaññan’”ti.
mn72:10.1: “Kiṃ nu kho, bho gotama, ‘hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā, idameva saccaṃ moghamaññan’ti—
mn72:10.4: ‘hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā, idameva saccaṃ moghamaññan’”ti.
mn72:11.1: “Kiṃ pana, bho gotama, ‘na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā, idameva saccaṃ moghamaññan’ti—
mn72:11.4: ‘na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā, idameva saccaṃ moghamaññan’”ti.
mn72:12.1: “Kiṃ nu kho, bho gotama, ‘hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā, idameva saccaṃ moghamaññan’ti—
mn72:12.4: ‘hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā, idameva saccaṃ moghamaññan’”ti.
mn72:13.1: “Kiṃ pana, bho gotama, ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā, idameva saccaṃ moghamaññan’ti—
mn72:13.4: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā, idameva saccaṃ moghamaññan’”ti.
mn72:14.1: “‘Kiṃ nu kho, bho gotama, sassato loko, idameva saccaṃ moghamaññanti—
mn72:14.2: evaṃdiṭṭhi bhavaṃ gotamo’ti iti puṭṭho samāno ‘na kho ahaṃ, vaccha, evaṃdiṭṭhi—
mn72:14.3: sassato loko, idameva saccaṃ moghamaññan’ti vadesi.
mn72:14.4: ‘Kiṃ pana, bho gotama, asassato loko, idameva saccaṃ moghamaññanti—
mn72:14.5: evaṃdiṭṭhi bhavaṃ gotamo’ti iti puṭṭho samāno ‘na kho ahaṃ, vaccha, evaṃdiṭṭhi—
mn72:14.6: asassato loko, idameva saccaṃ moghamaññan’ti vadesi.
mn72:14.7: ‘Kiṃ nu kho, bho gotama, antavā loko, idameva saccaṃ moghamaññanti—
mn72:14.8: evaṃdiṭṭhi bhavaṃ gotamo’ti iti puṭṭho samāno ‘na kho ahaṃ, vaccha, evaṃdiṭṭhi—
mn72:14.9: antavā loko, idameva saccaṃ moghamaññan’ti vadesi.
mn72:14.10: ‘Kiṃ pana, bho gotama, anantavā loko, idameva saccaṃ moghamaññanti—
mn72:14.11: evaṃdiṭṭhi bhavaṃ gotamo’ti iti puṭṭho samāno ‘na kho ahaṃ, vaccha, evaṃdiṭṭhi—
mn72:14.12: anantavā loko, idameva saccaṃ moghamaññan’ti vadesi.
mn72:14.13: ‘Kiṃ nu kho, bho gotama, taṃ jīvaṃ taṃ sarīraṃ, idameva saccaṃ moghamaññanti—
mn72:14.14: evaṃdiṭṭhi bhavaṃ gotamo’ti iti puṭṭho samāno ‘na kho ahaṃ, vaccha, evaṃdiṭṭhi—
mn72:14.15: taṃ jīvaṃ taṃ sarīraṃ, idameva saccaṃ moghamaññan’ti vadesi.
mn72:14.16: ‘Kiṃ pana, bho gotama, aññaṃ jīvaṃ aññaṃ sarīraṃ, idameva saccaṃ moghamaññanti—
mn72:14.17: evaṃdiṭṭhi bhavaṃ gotamo’ti iti puṭṭho samāno ‘na kho ahaṃ, vaccha, evaṃdiṭṭhi—
mn72:14.18: aññaṃ jīvaṃ aññaṃ sarīraṃ, idameva saccaṃ moghamaññan’ti vadesi.
mn72:14.19: ‘Kiṃ nu kho, bho gotama, hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā, idameva saccaṃ moghamaññanti—
mn72:14.20: evaṃdiṭṭhi bhavaṃ gotamo’ti iti puṭṭho samāno ‘na kho ahaṃ, vaccha, evaṃdiṭṭhi—
mn72:14.21: hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā, idameva saccaṃ moghamaññan’ti vadesi.
mn72:15.1: ‘Kiṃ pana, bho gotama, na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā, idameva saccaṃ moghamaññanti—
mn72:15.2: evaṃdiṭṭhi bhavaṃ gotamo’ti iti puṭṭho samāno ‘na kho ahaṃ, vaccha, evaṃdiṭṭhi—
mn72:15.3: na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā, idameva saccaṃ moghamaññan’ti vadesi.
mn72:15.4: ‘Kiṃ nu kho, bho gotama, hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā, idameva saccaṃ moghamaññanti—
mn72:15.5: evaṃdiṭṭhi bhavaṃ gotamo’ti iti puṭṭho samāno ‘na kho ahaṃ, vaccha, evaṃdiṭṭhi—
mn72:15.6: hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā, idameva saccaṃ moghamaññan’ti vadesi.
mn72:15.7: ‘Kiṃ pana, bho gotama, neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā, idameva saccaṃ moghamaññanti—
mn72:15.8: evaṃdiṭṭhi bhavaṃ gotamo’ti iti puṭṭho samāno ‘na kho ahaṃ, vaccha, evaṃdiṭṭhi—
mn72:15.9: neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā, idameva saccaṃ moghamaññan’ti vadesi.
mn72:16.1: Kiṃ pana bho gotamo ādīnavaṃ sampassamāno evaṃ imāni sabbaso diṭṭhigatāni anupagato”ti?
mn72:17.1: “‘Sassato loko’ti kho, vaccha, diṭṭhigatametaṃ diṭṭhigahanaṃ diṭṭhikantāro diṭṭhivisūkaṃ diṭṭhivipphanditaṃ diṭṭhisaṃyojanaṃ sadukkhaṃ savighātaṃ saupāyāsaṃ sapariḷāhaṃ, na nibbidāya na virāgāya na nirodhāya na upasamāya na abhiññāya na sambodhāya na nibbānāya saṃvattati.
mn72:17.14: ‘na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’ti kho, vaccha …
mn72:17.16: ‘hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’ti kho, vaccha …
mn72:17.18: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’ti kho, vaccha, diṭṭhigatametaṃ diṭṭhigahanaṃ diṭṭhikantāro diṭṭhivisūkaṃ diṭṭhivipphanditaṃ diṭṭhisaṃyojanaṃ sadukkhaṃ savighātaṃ saupāyāsaṃ sapariḷāhaṃ, na nibbidāya na virāgāya na nirodhāya na upasamāya na abhiññāya na sambodhāya na nibbānāya saṃvattati.
mn72:17.19: Imaṃ kho ahaṃ, vaccha, ādīnavaṃ sampassamāno evaṃ imāni sabbaso diṭṭhigatāni anupagato”ti.
mn72:18.4: ‘iti rūpaṃ, iti rūpassa samudayo, iti rūpassa atthaṅgamo;
mn72:18.5: iti vedanā, iti vedanāya samudayo, iti vedanāya atthaṅgamo;
mn72:18.6: iti saññā, iti saññāya samudayo, iti saññāya atthaṅgamo;
mn72:18.7: iti saṅkhārā, iti saṅkhārānaṃ samudayo, iti saṅkhārānaṃ atthaṅgamo;
mn72:18.8: iti viññāṇaṃ, iti viññāṇassa samudayo, iti viññāṇassa atthaṅgamo’ti.
mn72:18.9: Tasmā tathāgato sabbamaññitānaṃ sabbamathitānaṃ sabbaahaṅkāramamaṅkāramānānusayānaṃ khayā virāgā nirodhā cāgā paṭinissaggā anupādā vimuttoti vadāmī”ti.
mn72:19.1: “Evaṃ vimuttacitto pana, bho gotama, bhikkhu kuhiṃ upapajjatī”ti?
mn72:19.5: “Tena hi, bho gotama, upapajjati ca na ca upapajjatī”ti?
mn72:19.6: “Upapajjati ca na ca upapajjatīti kho, vaccha, na upeti”.
mn72:19.7: “Tena hi, bho gotama, neva upapajjati na na upapajjatī”ti?
mn72:19.8: “Neva upapajjati na na upapajjatīti kho, vaccha, na upeti”.
mn72:20.1: “‘Evaṃ vimuttacitto pana, bho gotama, bhikkhu kuhiṃ upapajjatī’ti iti puṭṭho samāno ‘upapajjatīti kho, vaccha, na upetī’ti vadesi.
mn72:20.2: ‘Tena hi, bho gotama, na upapajjatī’ti iti puṭṭho samāno ‘na upapajjatīti kho, vaccha, na upetī’ti vadesi.
mn72:20.3: ‘Tena hi, bho gotama, upapajjati ca na ca upapajjatī’ti iti puṭṭho samāno ‘upapajjati ca na ca upapajjatīti kho, vaccha, na upetī’ti vadesi.
mn72:20.4: ‘Tena hi, bho gotama, neva upapajjati na na upapajjatī’ti iti puṭṭho samāno ‘neva upapajjati na na upapajjatīti kho, vaccha, na upetī’ti vadesi.
mn72:20.5: Etthāhaṃ, bho gotama, aññāṇamāpādiṃ, ettha sammohamāpādiṃ.
mn72:20.6: Yāpi me esā bhoto gotamassa purimena kathāsallāpena ahu pasādamattā sāpi me etarahi antarahitā”ti.
mn72:21.2: Gambhīro hāyaṃ, vaccha, dhammo duddaso duranubodho santo paṇīto atakkāvacaro nipuṇo paṇḍitavedanīyo.
mn72:21.3: So tayā dujjāno aññadiṭṭhikena aññakhantikena aññarucikena aññatrayogena aññatrācariyakena.
mn72:22.2: yathā te khameyya tathā naṃ byākareyyāsi.
mn72:22.3: Taṃ kiṃ maññasi, vaccha, sace te purato aggi jaleyya, jāneyyāsi tvaṃ:
mn72:22.5: “Sace me, bho gotama, purato aggi jaleyya, jāneyyāhaṃ:
mn72:23.2: ‘yo te ayaṃ purato aggi jalati ayaṃ aggi kiṃ paṭicca jalatī’ti, evaṃ puṭṭho tvaṃ, vaccha, kinti byākareyyāsī”ti?
mn72:23.4: ‘yo te ayaṃ purato aggi jalati ayaṃ aggi kiṃ paṭicca jalatī’ti, evaṃ puṭṭho ahaṃ, bho gotama, evaṃ byākareyyaṃ:
mn72:23.5: ‘yo me ayaṃ purato aggi jalati ayaṃ aggi tiṇakaṭṭhupādānaṃ paṭicca jalatī’”ti.
mn72:24.1: “Sace te, vaccha, purato so aggi nibbāyeyya, jāneyyāsi tvaṃ:
mn72:24.3: “Sace me, bho gotama, purato so aggi nibbāyeyya, jāneyyāhaṃ:
mn72:25.2: ‘yo te ayaṃ purato aggi nibbuto so aggi ito katamaṃ disaṃ gato—
mn72:25.3: puratthimaṃ vā dakkhiṇaṃ vā pacchimaṃ vā uttaraṃ vā’ti, evaṃ puṭṭho tvaṃ, vaccha, kinti byākareyyāsī”ti?
mn72:25.4: “Na upeti, bho gotama, yañhi so, bho gotama, aggi tiṇakaṭṭhupādānaṃ paṭicca ajali tassa ca pariyādānā aññassa ca anupahārā anāhāro nibbutotveva saṅkhyaṃ gacchatī”ti.
mn72:26.1: “Evameva kho, vaccha, yena rūpena tathāgataṃ paññāpayamāno paññāpeyya taṃ rūpaṃ tathāgatassa pahīnaṃ ucchinnamūlaṃ tālāvatthukataṃ anabhāvaṃkataṃ āyatiṃ anuppādadhammaṃ.
mn72:26.2: Rūpasaṅkhayavimutto kho, vaccha, tathāgato gambhīro appameyyo duppariyogāḷho—
mn72:26.4: Upapajjatīti na upeti, na upapajjatīti na upeti, upapajjati ca na ca upapajjatīti na upeti, neva upapajjati na na upapajjatīti na upeti.
mn72:27.1: Yāya vedanāya tathāgataṃ paññāpayamāno paññāpeyya sā vedanā tathāgatassa pahīnā ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṅkatā āyatiṃ anuppādadhammā.
mn72:27.2: Vedanāsaṅkhayavimutto kho, vaccha, tathāgato gambhīro appameyyo duppariyogāḷho—
mn72:27.4: Upapajjatīti na upeti, na upapajjatīti na upeti, upapajjati ca na ca upapajjatīti na upeti, neva upapajjati na na upapajjatīti na upeti.
mn72:28.1: Yāya saññāya tathāgataṃ paññāpayamāno paññāpeyya sā saññā tathāgatassa pahīnā ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṅkatā āyatiṃ anuppādadhammā.
mn72:28.2: Saññāsaṅkhayavimutto kho, vaccha, tathāgato gambhīro appameyyo duppariyogāḷho—
mn72:28.4: Upapajjatīti na upeti, na upapajjatīti na upeti, upapajjati ca na ca upapajjatīti na upeti, neva upapajjati na na upapajjatīti na upeti.
mn72:29.1: Yehi saṅkhārehi tathāgataṃ paññāpayamāno paññāpeyya te saṅkhārā tathāgatassa pahīnā ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṅkatā āyatiṃ anuppādadhammā.
mn72:29.2: Saṅkhārasaṅkhayavimutto kho, vaccha, tathāgato gambhīro appameyyo duppariyogāḷho—
mn72:29.4: Upapajjatīti na upeti, na upapajjatīti na upeti, upapajjati ca na ca upapajjatīti na upeti, neva upapajjati na na upapajjatīti na upeti.
mn72:30.1: Yena viññāṇena tathāgataṃ paññāpayamāno paññāpeyya taṃ viññāṇaṃ tathāgatassa pahīnaṃ ucchinnamūlaṃ tālāvatthukataṃ anabhāvaṅkataṃ āyatiṃ anuppādadhammaṃ.
mn72:30.2: Viññāṇasaṅkhayavimutto kho, vaccha, tathāgato gambhīro appameyyo duppariyogāḷho—
mn72:30.4: Upapajjatīti na upeti, na upapajjatīti na upeti, upapajjati ca na ca upapajjatīti na upeti, neva upapajjati na na upapajjatīti na upetī”ti.
mn72:31.1: Evaṃ vutte, vacchagotto paribbājako bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
mn72:31.2: “seyyathāpi, bho gotama, gāmassa vā nigamassa vā avidūre mahāsālarukkho.
mn72:31.3: Tassa aniccatā sākhāpalāsā palujjeyyuṃ, tacapapaṭikā palujjeyyuṃ, pheggū palujjeyyuṃ;
mn72:31.4: so aparena samayena apagatasākhāpalāso apagatatacapapaṭiko apagataphegguko suddho assa, sāre patiṭṭhito;
mn72:31.5: evameva bhoto gotamassa pāvacanaṃ apagatasākhāpalāsaṃ apagatatacapapaṭikaṃ apagatapheggukaṃ suddhaṃ, sāre patiṭṭhitaṃ.
mn72:31.8: upāsakaṃ maṃ bhavaṃ gotamo dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupetaṃ saraṇaṃ gatan”ti.
